blog.description: A place for hopekook lovers to unite! note: I do not ship these two. I want everyone to feel welcome here! :D haters will be blocked

summary: How would each bts member console their gf when theyre feeling down? I love your blog so much btw💗
question: How would each bts member console their gf when theyre feeling down? I love your blog so much btw💗
answer:
Hi cuties. So I’m just gonna put theese together and do all of them, and then both how they would console when they are feeling down but also if their partner was 💜💜💜

So for this one I’m taking a look at their Moon signs, but also just taking their whole chart into consideration.

Jin - Aries Moon

So with Jin being born in the vibrant sign of Aries, (and also because of his Sag Sun) he will have a big need for independence. He will have a hard time sentimental display and fear to be seen as weak for showing too much emotion. He is a warrior and will deal with his problems head on. Because of this I don’t think he would really enjoy talking too much about emotions if his feelings were hurt. I think he would like to deal with it on his own. He is easy to anger but also pretty quick to forgive. If his partner was hurt on the other hand, he would be so supportive and attentive. Giving great advice and help cheer them up.

Min Yoongi - Moon in Virgo

So, Yoongis Moon and Sun is conflicting. His Pisces Sun is emotional, sensitive and dreamy, where his Virgo Moon is analytical, detail oriented and practical. I’m pretty sure I’ve mentioned this before, but Yoongi has a hard time figuring out his emotions. This is common for people with Pisces Sun, but I think his Virgo Moon would really make it even more confusing. So therefore I think he would struggle with asking for help if he is the one feeling down. Probably just luck himself away in his studio and be alone for a while. He would probably be ready to talk about it at some point, but his partner will need to be careful not to pressure him. If it was his partner that was feeling down, he would be the best boyfriend ever. They wouldn’t even need to tell him, because he already knows. He would be a great listener, giving good advice and just cuddles and kisses until his partner was feeling better.

Hoseok- Moon in Taurus

So Hoseok has a very practical approach to emotions. He knows what he wants and need, and know how to get it. His Taurus Moon is a really good placement for him. So I think if he was feeling down he would have no problem talking to his partner about it. He might not need advice, but he will enjoy just being heard you know. If his partner was feeling he would give so great advice and be a good listener. I can also see him being sweet, preparing them a nice bath in the bathtub, with lots and lots of bubbles. Also, he would make them laugh so they forgot why they were feeling down

Namjoon - Moon in Sagittarius

Being a Sagittarius Moon makes Namjoon a true optimist. I think that even if he was feeling down he wouldn’t let it affect him too much. His Virgo Sun also helps him analyze his problems and find a solution. It’s not that he can’t get upset, because of course he can. But he has an amazing ability to see the fun and light, even where there is darkness you know. If he was to console his partner I think he would open a discussion about it, and get help finding a solution or cheeeing him up. If his partner was feeling down he would try so hard to cheer them up. He would both be great at giving advice, but also great at putting a smile back on their face.

Jimin- Moon in Gemini

So with Jimin having is Moon in Gemini for him communication is key. He loves sharing information with others. So I think he will be open when he is having a bad day or had his feelings hurt. No matter if he is at home or away traveling, I can see him wanting to let his partner in on what he is feeling. Either telling them when he gets home in the evening or calling them on the phone to have someone to talk to it about. Same thing if his partner was feeling down, would love to just sit and listen and cheer them up, no matter if he was away or home.

Taehyung- Moon in Aries

So, Taehyung is also an Aries Moon like Jin. So kinda the same thing. Though I feel Tae would probably be more closed of, not wanting to look “weak”. I think that if his partner asked if he was okay or wanted to talk, he wouldn’t say no to that but I don’t think he would say something on his own.

Jungkook- Moon in Leo

Jungkook has his Moon in the vibrant and warm-hearted Leo. He is very sensitive and his emotions are easily hurt. He will be open when he is in a bad mood or feeling down. He will need lots of attention and love, that way he will feel better again. If he was consoling his partner I think he would do anything to help them feel better. Tell them just to stay on the couch while I made dinner or something like that.

summary:
Bad Time For A Good Time -
Chapter 10: Complicated.
Jungkook x Reader, Namjoon x Reader
Warning: Cursing (as always) 
Prev|...
body:
Bad Time For A Good Time -

Chapter 10: Complicated.

Jungkook x Reader, Namjoon x Reader

Warning: Cursing (as always)

Prev| Next

Jeon Jungkook is the ultimate bachelor; guarded, angry, rich, body count that puts the numeric system to shame, and aimless - what else could a girl want? You’ve been working in the same dead end job, hoping it would get you somewhere. You finally have your foot in the door, and the person you need to win over is slamming your foot out. What can you do?

I will be posting every day at 10am AKST! I don’t have links included in my posts, because tumblr still messes with it, but all the links are in my masterlist! 🖤

Post time per time zone:

AKST - 10am

PST - 11am

MST - 12pm

CST - 1pm

EST - 2pm

blog.name: foreverconfused-foreverlost
blog.title: 💚Layla'sWonderland
blog.description:
🌈LET'S GET READY TO ~Fangirl~ 🌈 
Request: Open (For the writing challenge only) 🌼
Current staus; Master list who? (I'm sorry. I'm trying. I just ugh. it's not going so well)
Supernatural/ Supergirl/ Hetalia/ Danganronpa/ bts/ The walking dead/ miraculous ladybug/ Dan and Phil/ once upon a time. 
I'm in more fandoms but the ones above are ones I either write for, make moodboards or do ships for. Some I do two of those or some all three. 
🥀🥀🥀
My main blog which I don't use anymore (long story) is @laylachanda 
My age regression blog is @smol-baby-bunny-princess
🍼🐣🍭
I also have a blog where I just reblog Dan&Phil and Bts @craftingpersona
It is literally just those boys
2️⃣+7️⃣=9️⃣

summary: A couple of Supergirl Scenario WIPS in my drafts that aren't completely finished but damn near finished. Question is shall I...
body:
A couple of Supergirl Scenario WIPS in my drafts that aren’t completely finished but damn near finished. Question is shall I finish them while working on my Ed Sheeran’s songs moodboards orrrr continue the Taehyung soulmate fanfic which is no where near as completed????

Hmm? 🤔❔❓ Decisions. Decisions.

Ps; Stray kids moodboards have been completed. Whoop. Whoop. Achievement unlocked. Hmm??? Y'all want a sneak peak of that as well? 👀

summary: Hogwarts AU update
title: Hogwarts AU update
body:
So my masterlist just went through a complete renovation - take a look if you feel like it ^^ but honestly it looks better on desktop than mobile, cause you know, tumblr is all shitty on the phone. 

anyway, I’m actually currently working on Cold (remember that Yoongi Hogwarts AU I teased, like a hundred years ago?) and I’m hoping to publish it either today or tomorrow *gasp*

So look forward to it!
